oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Aaron Gamble McReynolds to his brother from the Battle of Murfreesboro
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. Aaron Gamble McReynolds wrote this letter to his brother in Blount County, Tenn., from Murfreesboro, Tenn. Camped near Stones River, he described the condition of several mutual acquaintances and advised his brother on volunteering. Lt. McReynolds enlisted in Co. H, 2nd Tenn. Cav., USA. On June 4, 1864, he was appointed Captain of Co. D, 2nd Tenn. Cav. Regt. McReynolds was killed at the Battle of Decatur, Alabama, on October 26, 1864.
